resps: Assigned technical requirements and carried out the specifications.
Converted a static single-page application built with  HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React into a dynamic, interactive and user friendly interface by integrating animations, transitions and carousels.
Handled API requests utilizing Axios to fetch data and displayed it with the use of a skeleton loader pagination and dynamic routing.
Effectively worked in a virtual team and collaborative  environment using Git version control and Github.
Structured curriculum covering all the essential front-end technologies such as design, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.
Integrates the use of APIs and async JavaScript
Emphasizes building real-word application to prepare students the work force.
